name: Offroad Mechanic Simulator: Prologue - First Job
name_original: Offroad Mechanic Simulator: Prologue - First Job
description:
Offroad Mechanic Simulator: Prologue - First Job is a free version of Offroad Mechanic Simulator. With a large slice through the gameplay, it provides a good taste of the full game and a fun experience on its own! If you want to try the full version, check below:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1387500/Offroad_Mechanic_Simulator/

Enter the world of off-road vehicles!

Have you ever seen an off-road beast of a car and thought that working on this vehicle as a mechanic must be a ton of fun? Offroad Mechanic Simulator provides you with an experience as close as possible to modifying real off-road rides to face immensely rough terrain.



Get your very own garage, full of equipment and tools of the trade. Shop for the best parts on the market and mount them to make the cars far exceed their original capabilities. Repair, restore, modify – but mind the budget, you’re on contract after all!



However, no work is done without testing it! Jump behind the well and see how your modifications perform against cliffs, deep sand, running rivers, thick mud, and any kind of harsh obstacles you can stumble upon off the beaten path. You might need to bring in some specialized equipment to face some of the hardest tasks!



Offroad Mechanic Simulator: Prologue – First Job shows off the definite experience, far evolved from the previous demonstrations. This is a great occasion to discover the game anew and prepare for the full release.

Players can enjoy features such as:

  • Improved physics, car models, and handling
  • Entirely new UI
  • Three new cars to dismantle and re-assemble
  • Repair, Washing, Tuning, and Adjustment commissions
  • A new Forest map to conquer
  • New garage rooms, parts, and options
  • New perks and skills
  • Wide access to nearly all skills available in the full game
  • Possibility of achieving up to level 4 of experience
